Title: The Erlenmeyer Flask
Plot: When Deep Throat points out a news story about a fugitive who apparently drowned, Mulder and Scully cannot see what makes the case special but follow it up anyway. With Deep Throat's insistence, they discover evidence of a secret government project code-named Purity Control, which uses human test subjects and infects them with extraterrestrial DNA. However, the evidence and everyone who has seen it is quickly being eliminated.
GuestStars: Lindsey Ginter, Anne DeSalvo, Simon Webb, Jim Leard, Ken Kramer, Phillip MacKenzie, Jaylene Hamilton, Mike Mitchell, John Payne
